column4: hello again. i am a complete linux n00b. i use the synaptic program to download and install gnuchess, but it didn't turn up under applications>games. also, i don't know how to acess ~/.mozilla/firefox/ so that i can transfer my firefox settings from one computer to another
a .foo folder is hidden. on your browser go to View.. then hidden files.
as for the other go into a terminal and enter gnuchess   and hit enter.
any directory with a . at the beginning [a prefix]  is a hidden dir.
try going into a terminal and typing   'gnuchess'
